title: Bug 124777: Setting a blank tooltip in the chart title causes an exception when previewed
OB: When previewing the chart, nothing should happen when moving the mouse over the chart title.
EB: When previewing the chart and moving the mouse over the chart title, an unexpected exception dialog pops up.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new simple chart. 2. Add title interactivity with the option 'mouse over/show tooltip'. Keep the tooltip text blank and click the Add button.
